item.description:
Come join your Beanstalk friends for dinner and a movie on $6.00 Tuesday at the Circle Cinema in Cleveland Circle.

Those that come to dinner get to help pick the movie for the evening. The first to arrive will grab a table at Applebees (next to the theater) around 6:15 PM. During dinner we will review what movies are playing and have a start time between 7:30 and 8:00 PM. Whatever the majority can agree on is what we'll see.

When you RSVP Marie will respond with her cell phone number so if you're running late and can't make dinner, you can find out what movie we've decided to see and when it starts.
item.how_to_find_us: When you RSVP, I'll respond with my cell phone number.
item.name: Dinner and a Movie Night
